title: kandha vandharuL
sahitya:
kandA vandaruL tharalAhAdA gadhivEREdu (kandA)

anupallavi

sendUr vaLar guHA aDimaiyin
sindA kulam tIra nI vaLiya
vandAl undan maHimai kuRaiyumO
vaLLi maNavALA puLLi mayil ERum (kandA)

caraNam

pacciLaNG kuzhaviyaip peRRa tAy
parindaNaippadu kadananRO
parama dayAkaran enRu pEr puhazh
paDaittavan nee anRO
saccidAnanda mURti-SaravaNOt-
bava guHanE Sankaran mahanE
dayavuDanE tirumAl marugA manam
irangi unadaDimai enniDam parindu (kandA)
